page.title: 16RUNNING FOR FUN
page.content: When I woke up in the morning I was nervous. It was the big day & I had to run thirteen miles. It was half past ten & I was getting all my gear on. Then I went to Plough Corner. We moved up to the start line. A man held a Union Jack flag up & said, On your marks, get set & then he put the flag down. We were off!!! I ran with my two friends and my number was 42. I started off nice & steady & the next thing I knew was that I had gone 1 mile. On the 5 mile mark my legs started to ache. I went passed my house twice & my mum took a picture of me. Crossing the finishing line was not very nice, but I had made it. I had run the thirteen mile course.
